name: Xpad Network BETA
description: What is the project about? Xpad Network as BETA tokens as the base and interact with other tokens on chains, aiming to become is the first lossless DeFi protocol. What makes your project unique? ClaimX: Any token on chains that incurred capital loss can swap into BETA and apply for reimbursement. History of your project. Xpad Project have been live since August 2023, several improvements have been made like replacing claim feature to ClaimX Whatâ€™s next for your project? Introducing staking feature for BETAs. What can your token be used for? BETA are Xpad Network platform tokens, benefits and airdrop will build around BETA. Holding 50,000,000 of BETA will automatically get into the whitelist of new token to be launched on Xpad Launchpad.
